FuncDef:
The assign queue command specifies a lossless queue for which the NPCC function is enabled.
The undo assign queue command disables the NPCC function for a specified queue. The assign queue command specifies a lossless queue for which the NPCC function is enabled. The undo assign queue command disables the NPCC function for a specified queue. By default, no lossless queue is specified for enabling the NPCC function. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a lossless queue for which the NPCC function is enabled.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 5.
